sentences.en: As a player he was unselfish, a true team man.
sentences.cn: 作为一名选手，他毫无私念，真正把自己摆在团队中。

sentences.en: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentences.cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentences.en: He will shortly become the fulcrum of the England team.
sentences.cn: 他不久就会成为英格兰队的支柱。

sentences.en: His captaincy of the team was ended by mild eye trouble.
sentences.cn: 他由于患轻度眼疾而不再担任队长一职。

sentences.en: I got quite a lot of ribbing from my team-mates.
sentences.cn: 队友们经常开我的玩笑。

sentences.en: Once the fire has died out, the salvage team will move in.
sentences.cn: 一旦大火熄灭，救援小组就会马上进入。

sentences.en: Shaun McCalister also played for the varsity basketball team.
sentences.cn: 肖恩·麦卡利斯特也为校篮球队效过力。

sentences.en: The British team did not disguise their delight at their success.
sentences.cn: 英国队毫不掩饰他们获胜的喜悦。

sentences.en: The governors were joined by Mr Hunter and his management team.
sentences.cn: 亨特先生及他率领的管理小组加入了州长们的队伍。

sentences.en: The team also won praise for sportsmanship and fair play.
sentences.cn: 该队还因其良好的体育精神及公平竞争精神而受到了表扬。

sentences.en: The team has fought its way to the cup final.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍一路拼杀闯进了杯赛的决赛。

sentences.en: The team posed as drug dealers to trap the ringleaders.
sentences.cn: 该队队员装扮成毒品贩子，诱捕罪犯头目。

sentences.en: The team was given a roasting by manager Alex Feguson.
sentences.cn: 这个团队遭到了亚历克斯·费格森经理的严厉批评。

sentences.en: The team would have need of a driver of his worth.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍需要一位他这样技术水平的司机。

sentences.en: We fixed for the team to visit our headquarters.
sentences.cn: 我们安排了该工作组参观我们的总部。

sentences.en: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.cn: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

phrases.tran_cn: 一线队；首发阵容；第一阵容
生产队；制作组；生产大队
具有团队精神的人；良好的合作伙伴；善于团队合作的人
n. 团队精神；合作精神
配合，协力；工作小组；协同工作

trans.tran_cn: 队，组，团队，工作组，（野鸭等）群，同胎仔
trans.tran_en: a group of people who play a game or sport together against another group
to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

trans.tran_cn: 协同工作，合作，把（牛马等）联套在车上
